nodes.text: Vilus Garr was a male Devaronian mercenary captain and warlord who was hired by the Hutt Cartel around the time of the conquest of Makeb to lead the armies gathering on the planet Darvannis. Garr used a stealth field generator and blaster pistol in combat. However, Garr and the other three warlords—Sunder, Horic, and Tu'chuk—were unknowingly hired by the Dread Master Styrak and not the Cartel. The four warlords were slain before Styrak's plans could advance beyond Darvannis.

Vilus Garr appears as one of the Four Warlords, who collectively appear as the sixth and penultimate boss in the "Scum and Villainy" Operation. The Operation was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in the 2012 Digital Expansion Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel, and defeating the Warlords in various difficulty modes rewards players with painting-like trophies of the Warlords for use in the 2014 Digital Expansion Galactic Strongholds.
